name: The Ned-Liest Catch
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Jeff Westbrook

plot: When Krabbapple gets suspended and put into detention after hurting Bart, Bart tries to break her out, but it ends that Flanders is the one that saves her life. But soon, Ned figures out ...
